entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller type to support SafeHandle in source-generated marshalling without hard-coding in the generator #74035
    8.0.0
  • ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback(checkRevocation: True) failed on macOS 12 with RevocationStatusUnknown #74034
  • [API Proposal]: Custom [Try]GetValue<T> methods on JsonElement for efficient projection of string values to dotnet types #74028
  • Proposal: Update minimum CMake version required to build the dotnet/runtime repo to 3.18.1 #74027
    8.0.0
  • [Regression] System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink Equals broken in net7 preview #74026
    7.0.0
  • Prevent behavioral change in built-in operators for IntPtr and UIntPtr #74022
    7.0.0
  • Unnecessary shr emitted for repeated multiplication #74020
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 188 Regressions from GC changes #74014
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x86: 16 Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml #74013
  • System.Text.Json -> Deserialize Null to Integer Property #74008
  • Access Violation in CastHelpers.ChkCastClassSpecial #74005
    Future
  • Hang for x64 runtime on arm64 Windows virtual machine #74003
    7.0.0
  • UInt128 implicit casting #74001
  • [NativeAot] Devirtualization opportunity around field loads #74000
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize call doesn't return and continues to run for large lists. #73992

Closed

  • Support constructor parameters in JsonConverter attribute #73984
  • CI build failed: "Agent was purged, cancelling the pipeline" #73339
  • Info in host/testing.md is outdated for local testing #73993
    8.0.0
  • DataContract and derived types missing Equals implementation #67371
  • Mono WASM debugger displays private members of base class alongside other properties #43184
    8.0.0
  • Can't get assembly probing to work; not sure why. #73710
  • .NET 6 SDK not being recognized on popOS 22.04 #73764
  • src/libraries/Native changes don't trigger GCC leg #58779
    7.0.0
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe #3188
    7.0.0
  • Nanosecond time #27191
    Future
  • Optimize generated code for Fixed statement #4872
  • String.StartsWith doesn't work if the string contains "AA" when using Norwegian/Danish cultureinfo in .NET 6 #73999
  • ./src/tests/build.sh: No such file or directory #72921
  • Mono runtime tests build occasionally times out #40933
    Future
  • Cross-Architecture publish user experience should be better #71395
    7.0.0
  • runtimeconfig.template support #72310
    8.0.0
  • [ NativeAOT ] Using PublishSingleFile option leads to "Invalid input specification" exception #72559
    8.0.0
  • AccessViolationException should not be catchable #73794
    7.0.0
  • ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed. #73755
    Future
  • NativeAOT ignores dependency's changes #64163
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.Volatile_and_durable_enlistments #73874
    7.0.0
  • Intermediate Certs not being sent from client to server on MAC #66537
    Future
  • Application Crash #71708
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.ComponentModel #73724
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move X.509 certificate tests under S.S.Cryptography #74033
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74031
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #74029
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix nullable annotations on generic math interfaces #74025
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #74024
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #74023
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Disable the ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test for NativeAOT #74019
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Net7 workload changes #74018
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove project dependency in System.Configuration.Tests.csproj #74016
    area-System.Configuration, test-bug
  • Add `--reference-file` to ilverify #74012
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove reflection from AppHostUpdateTests #73988
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Bump main branding to 8.0 #73985
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Make FileInfo/DirectoryInfo.Name lazy #73983
    area-System.IO
  • Change to GetLastPInvokeError where possible #73980
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Update S.R.Metadata in HostModel #74009
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Disable ILASM roundtrip for mainv2 test #73956
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Reset OOB package authoring for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #74032
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #73982
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #73970
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix permissions value in S.D.Process tests #74011
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #73972
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Make PublishAot incremental #73989
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve failure mode when PublishSingleFile and PublishAot are specified together #73995
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Warn if runtimeconfig.template.json is used with PublishAot #73996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Publish ILC as a trimmed+R2R+singlefile executable #73987
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73977
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix formatting of arm/arm64 addresses #73967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of corrupted state exceptions on Windows #73889
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix another PublishAot incrementality issue #73994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry distributed transaction tests on MSDTC startup failure #73941
    area-System.Transactions
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x

Updated

  • Revert "Clean up AOT publish process" #74036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reenable HugeExpr Test on macOS ARM64 #73976
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Bring back PreInitializedAttribute handling to NativeAOT #73966
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    area-System.Memory
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
